findings.title: KTD-3: Redundancy amount check in mintValidatorPublicBatch
findings.description: Redundant amount check in mintValidatorPublicBatch function wasting gas.

findings.title: KTD-7: incorrect implementation of _beforeTokenTransfer
findings.description: The comment of `_beforeTokenTransfer` says only Minter are able to burn/transfer but the require statement only allows `from == address(0)`, which means only fresh mint can succeed. Nobody can transfer the NFT even if they are the minter.
